title: 关于skript插件做的sk文件的问题
author: aizhi_D
txt_content:
Variables:
    {_hurt} = 0
    {_cooltime} = 0
on damage of player:
    if victim has the permission "skript.hurt":
        add 1 to {hurt}
        if {_hurt} > 1:
        apply potion of Resistance of tier 1 to the victim for 999 minutes
        send victim title "6666666" with subtitle "666" for 3 second
        wait 30 second
        set {_hurt} to 0
        remove Resistance from the victim

so...以上运行时，玩家被打多次，title就会发送多次，如何在wait 30 second期间玩家被打只显示一次title？
要求：1.加到哪一行请详述
         2.尽量说明一下添加的句子的含义
